REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Requires individuals to provide advanced notice prior to applying to operate certain facilities or services
Summary: Requires individuals to provide advanced notice prior to applying to operate certain facilities or services.
LawCode: Amd ยง19.21, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring individuals to provide advanced notice prior to applying to operate certain facilities or services
